728613f-a.title: Richmond: Borough Place - Bay Street
728613f-a.text:
Borough Place, east from Bay Street, showing the
gate and wall of the United States Lighthouse Department
grounds.
May 5, 1929
P. L. Sperr
728613f-a.folder: Borough Place & Bay Street, Staten Island, NY

729711f-a.title: Richmond: Stuyvesant Place - Hyatt Street
729711f-a.text:
Stuyvesant Place, north from Hyatt Street (left),
showing (right), part of the Richmond Borough Hall, the
Richmond County Court House and the Macgregor Arms Apartments.
The 2i.- stoy frae housa, in the center of the view, is the
old house of tne Staten Island Institute of Arts and Sciences.
April 29, 1929
L. Sperr
729711f-a.folder: Stuyvesant Place & Hyatt Street, Staten Island, NY

728978f-a.title: Richmond: Hyatt Street - Stuyvesant Place
728978f-a.text:
Hyatt Street, north side, between Stuyvesant Place and
St. Marks Place. The St. George Theatre occupies the left corner
of the building. In the left background apnears the Brigbton
~eiohts Reformed Church.
March 5, 1930.
P. L. Sperr
728978f-a.folder: Hyatt Street & Stuyvesant Place, Staten Island, NY

728975f-a.title: Richmond: Hyatt Street - Stuyvesant Place
728975f-a.text:
15 Hyatt Street, north side, adjoining the N.W. corner of
Stuyvesant Street, showing the St. George branch of the Staten
Island Savings Bank.
June,1937
P. L. Sperr
728975f-a.folder: Hyatt Street & Stuyvesant Place, Staten Island, NY

728515f-b.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Borough Place
728515f-b.text:
Bay Street, east side, south frem but not including Borough
Place to Slosson Terrace. On the cleared area was later erected
the St. George Station of the United States Post Office. The
building in the background is the Staten Island Chamber of Commerce
Bldg.
oct. 22, 1931
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same location, at a later date, showing the new post office.
Oct. 1936.
P. L. Sperr
Neg.w E244
(3)
Viewing the post office in the epposite direction (northward).
Oct. 1936.
P. L. Sperr
